content: {"name": "St. Jerome\u2019s Community Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Register on Tuesdays from 11:00 am-12:00 pm\n100 families\n230 Alexander Ave, Bronx, NY 10454 this address can be used for pin location ", "email": "", "url": "https://jeromehands.com/activities", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "330 E. 138TH ST.", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10454", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.809593, "longitude": -73.924797}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 402-7866", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}]}
